name: @kooka/agent-sdk
description: Headless LingYun agent runtime for Node.js (tools + skills + plugins).

scripts.clean: node -e "require('fs').rmSync('dist', { recursive: true, force: true }); require('fs').rmSync('dist-test', { recursive: true, force: true })"
scripts.build: pnpm run clean && node scripts/ensure-core-build.cjs && tsc -p tsconfig.json
scripts.test: pnpm run build && pnpm run build:test && mocha --ui tdd ./dist-test/suite/*.test.js
scripts.test:e2e: pnpm run build && pnpm run build:test && mocha --ui tdd --timeout 300000 ./dist-test/e2e/*.test.js
